workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.22865889578568355 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.07949537551608865 --weight-decay 0.0008247160864564587 --lr 5.091716139418734e-05 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 216454 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.09397110217718692 --max-update 3500000 --max-epoch 15 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
